Bust Sculpture

#Cinema 4D  #Photoshop

Inspired by one of my favorite heroes in DOTA 2, Queen of Pain, I illustrated an imaginary character's bust using sculpture tools in Cinema 4D. As a game lover, I have great interest in game character design. This is my first character design work incorporating some elements from myself to show my creative thinking of how I want myself to look like in a virtual world.
